WelcomeControl¶

class WelcomeControl.WelcomeControl(root: tkinter.Tk)¶

Bases: control.ExtractionControl.ExtractionControl

The control class for the welcome activity.

The current welcome activity also contains the extraction feature.

root¶

The main tk window.

writer¶

A .csv writer to write extracted VFT reports.

views¶

The UI elements of the activity

messageQueue¶

A queue to store messages to be printed to the log window.

errorQueue¶

A queue to store errors to be printed to the log window.

reportList¶

A list of extracted VFT reports, in VFTReport objects.

reportReader¶

The reader for extracting the information out of VFT reports.

__init__(root: tkinter.Tk)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

checkQueue()¶

Checks both log message queues for messages to be printed.

Due to tkinter’s limitation, processes from other threads other than the main thread cannot access tkinter’s widgets. Therefore, this function was created as a workaround to print log messages during the extraction of the VFT reports.

extract(filepath: str)¶

Extracts the VFT reports in the selected path.

Parameters

filepath (str) – The path to the file/folder containing the VFT reports.

onFinishExtraction(reportList: List[models.VFTReport.VFTReport])¶

Method to be called upon finishing extraction.

Parameters

reportList (List[VFTReport]) – The list of extracted report.

onFinishSave()¶

Method to be called upon finishing saving the extracted reports.

onNextActivity()¶

Moves to the report viewing and editing activity.

queueError(error: str)¶

Queues an error message to be printed to the log window.

Parameters

error (str) – The message to be printed

queueMessage(message: str)¶

Queues a normal log message to be printed to the log window.

Parameters

message (str) – The message to be printed

saveReports()¶

Save the reports at selected location.

startActivity()¶

Initializes the UI elements.
